/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The buildings themselves are a mix of modern and traditional styles, showcasing the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene.
